## ğŸš« Prohibited Activities

The following activities are **STRICTLY PROHIBITED** and may result in legal action:

- Unauthorized cloning or forking
- Automated scraping or crawling

- AI training data collection
- Unauthorized distribution or redistribution
- Removal of copyright notices
- Commercial use without license
- Decoding or decrypting encoded files
